description: The Get Deleted Storage Account operation returns the specified deleted storage account along with its attributes. This operation requires the storage/get permission.

tags.description: Application specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs

recoveryid.description: The url of the recovery object, used to identify and recover the deleted storage account.

activekeyname.description: The current active storage account key name.

storage_account_name.description: The name of the storage account.

regenerationperiod.description: The key regeneration time duration specified in ISO-8601 format.

deleteddate.description: The time when the storage account was deleted, in UTC

autoregeneratekey.description: whether keyvault should manage the storage account for the user.

scheduledpurgedate.description: The time when the storage account is scheduled to be purged, in UTC
